name: Good Luck With The Lamps!
description:
Dr. James Bearington has had a hard day teaching sociology at Anthropomorphic Animal University, and all he wants to do is get to bed. Unfortunately, his pesky housekeeper has left the lamps on and it's up to James Bearington to turn them all off again. But, unbeknownst to the plucky sociology professor, his house was built on the site of an old indian bear burial ground and his lamps are now cursed by the spirits of long dead warriors! 

Don't be scared of the dark, now, brave bear!

-----

Good Luck With The Lamps! is a retro-inspired platformer built for My First Game Jam: Summer 2020, by two people who had no idea what they were doing. We plan to continue active development, and have a list of features to add, but for now the game is playable and we're very proud!

-----

Music by @tdous

-----

p.s. if you get stuck in a platform, press S and wiggle around a bit ;)

Mac build is provided but untested, please let us know if it's broken!
